comments:
Save Eclipse with a Visual Editor open.  Restart and it crashes.  It does this
on me every time and sometimes the workbench then gets into a pretty nasty state
where it fails to re-open the crashed class and any other VE showing stuck
"loading" prompts, ? graphics in the JavaBeans tree and a log with with target
VM errors.  The only recovery then seems to be closing and re-opening the workbench.

Can you please try with latest from HEAD? I just tried it with the standard RCP
Mail's View and it worked ok. Maybe you have a different class? Maybe not caught
up? A lot of fixes had gone in on Friday for hangs and such. Did you maybe crash
and then brought it up? That sometimes takes a different path then a successful
save and restart.

I'm using Eclipse RC1, EMF I200506020944, GEF 3.1M7, and latest VE from HEAD.

Running Eclipse 3.1RC1, EMF 20050602, GEF 3.1RC1, VE N20050608

I was able to open the SWTUserAdmin make a simple change to the comments, save
it, close the workspace, open the workspace, and hang it.

When I came back up there was no error log however.  Restarting it again came up
fine.
Fixed and released to HEAD for 1.1M2
